page.title: 10ST.MATTHEW'S CHURCH
page.content: {St. Matthew's Church is the {Anglican Parish Church for Otterbourne {and Allbrook.The}Vicar,Rev.F.Bianchi, retired in May 1985 after 9 years.In the future Otterbourne will share a vicar with Compton. The Services held in the Church are: Sundays 08 00 Holy Communion 11 00 Parish Communion or Matins and Sermon 18 30 Evensong Weekdays 07 30 Mattins (said) (except Mon.) 17 30 Evensong (said) Thursdays 10 00 Holy Communion There is a choir of about 50 children and adults.They practice every Thursday at 18 30. A monthly Choir Magazine "Top Sacred" includes dates for the diary, jokes, etc. Other Church organisations include the Sunday School, Fishes Youth Group and the Ladies' Group.
